name: Snake X Jack
description:
* I recommend downloading for the smoothest and most bad@$$ experience *

Controls

MoveShootJumpGrenadePlayer 1WASDGHJPlayer 2Arrow Keys123

Restart Game: Esc.      Restart Level: R.

Snake X Jack is a co-op mashup between Escape From New York and Big Trouble in Little China, with inspiration from Phish's Gamehendge songs, and shoot 'em up gameplay from Contra. 

The main song is by themaskedmonocle.

I had a blast making this for the mashup jam and I hope you enjoy it too!
